about_the_game:
With 23 of the world’s top players - 8 new to Virtua Tennis and 3 legends, including Federer, Nadal, Williams, Sharapova & Murray. Improved serve, net and stumble gameplay give more control than ever before.

New over-the-shoulder cam gets you to the heart of the action.

Sharpen up your skills with 12 Court Games such as Pot Shot and Pirate Wars.

  • New Players / Courts - Play as or against over 20 of the world's top players, including seven new to Virtua Tennis and three legends. All-new arenas and the officially licensed Davis Cup provide the most realistic tennis competition to date.
  • New Player Creation System - You now have full control over facial, body and clothing customization, as well as the depth to populate the game world with hundreds of unknown opponents.
  • More Court Games - Playing alone or with up to three friends compete in 12 mini-games, five completely new, and upload your hi-scores on the worldwide rankings in games such as Zoo Feeder and Pirate War.
  • Improved Gameplay - Courtside action is better than ever, with extensive updates to the famous arcade-style Virtua Tennis match engine, as well as 3D crowds and a more realistic courtside experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista
  • Processor: Intel® Dual Core Processor 2.8 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6600 Nvidia graphics card or ATI equivalent with support for Pixel Shader 3 DirectX Version: DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX Version: DirectX 9.0c or later
  • Hard Drive: 4 GB hard drive space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Input: Keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Quad Q8200 processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® 8000 series graphics card or ATI equivalent with support for Pixel Shader 3 DirectX Version: DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX Version: DirectX 9.0c or later
  • Hard Drive: 4 GB hard drive space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Input: Keyboard and mouse
